{{L/IMPERSONATEINTRO/
As an administrator, you can temporarily impersonate another user. This can be useful to test access permissions.
While you are impersonating another user, %DOREEN% will look and behave exactly as if you were logged in as that user. Administrator functions will therefore not be available. There is one exception: there will be a %{Stop impersonating}% menu item in the user menu at the top right of the screen which allows you to your normal administrator interface.
Please select the user you would like to impersonate:}}
